content: this is my 10th ravelry pattern so i ve decided to offer it for free thanks ravelers for all your support from the pattern > this mitten is a modern twist on the > traditional norwegian stranded > mittens the centre flowers are lotus > blossoms instead of selbu roses and > the geometric cuff adds to the modern > look knit in traditional black and > white for a subtle difference or in > bright colours for a trendy look the mittens require approximately 120 yards of main colour and contrast colour both in fingering weight a set of 5 dpns in us 1 2 25 mm a tapestry needle and scrap pieces of yarn **all hedda knits patterns include full-colour charts along with instructions **
